column1: Smoque BBQ////You all should be jealous
column2: I work a block away from Smoque and get to smell the wonderful aroma as it drifts through the neighborhood.  Now
column3: I am not a bbq expert
column4: but this food is consistently top notch.  The fact that there are lines is a testament to the fact that the Exec. Chef. knows what he is doing.  Add to that on many occasions he is walking around the dining room chatting with the customers.
